titles: The rights and authority of the Commons of the city of London in their Common-hall assembled, particularly in the choice and discharge of their sheriffs, asserted and cleared in answer to the vindication of the Lord-Mayor, Court of Aldermen, and Common-Council.
author: Atwood, William, d. 1705?
notes: Attributed to William Atwood by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: City of London (England). --  Court of Common Council.
